description: Analyzes borrower's financial statements (balance sheet, income statement, cash flow) based on Comptroller's Handbook guidelines to identify trends, anomalies, and repayment capacity indicators.

parameters.name: guideline_financial_statement_analysis_focus
parameters.description: Guideline on focus areas for financial statement analysis.
parameters.defaultValue: Focus on balance sheet (asset degradation, asset/liability levels), income statement, sources/uses of funds, projections.

parameters.name: guideline_cash_flow_definition
parameters.defaultValue: Operating revenue less operating costs paid, plus noncash expenses.

parameters.name: guideline_cash_flow_scrutiny
parameters.description: Guideline on cash flow points of scrutiny.
parameters.defaultValue: Changes in working capital, uses of cash flow (debt repayment, capex).

parameters.name: guideline_ratio_analysis
parameters.defaultValue: Compare with prior periods and industry/peer norms. Investigate deviations.

parameters.name: guideline_projection_analysis
parameters.defaultValue: Assess variance from historical, likelihood of achievement, multi-scenario analysis.

parameters.name: balance_sheet_summary_str
parameters.description: Stringified summary of key balance sheet items and trends.

parameters.name: income_statement_summary_str
parameters.description: Stringified summary of key income statement items and trends (revenues, profit margins).

parameters.name: cash_flow_statement_summary_str
parameters.description: Stringified summary of key cash flow items (operating, investing, financing, FCF).

parameters.name: financial_projections_summary_str
parameters.description: Stringified summary of financial projections if available.

parameters.name: key_financial_ratios_str
parameters.description: Stringified key financial ratios (e.g., liquidity, leverage, profitability, debt service coverage).
